title: Pulumi Launches New Infrastructure Lifecycle Features
author: Darryl K Taft
description: Pulumi adds new drift detection and remediation, time-to-live (TTL) stacks and more to its Infrastructure as Code (IaC) platform. Meanwhile, Pulumi CEO Joe Duffy pledges to keep innovating amid the potential HashiCorp-IBM deal.
cntitle: Pulumi 推出新的基础设施生命周期功能
cndescription: Pulumi 为其基础设施即代码 (IaC) 平台新增了漂移检测和修复、生存时间 (TTL) 堆栈等功能。与此同时，Pulumi 首席执行官乔·达菲承诺在 HashiCorp-IBM 潜在交易中继续创新。
